com.communote.server.core.mail

Class CatchAllSmtpMimeMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.mail.SmtpMimeMessageSender
      • com.communote.server.core.mail.CatchAllSmtpMimeMessageSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MimeMessageSender

    public class CatchAllSmtpMimeMessageSender
extends SmtpMimeMessageSender
    SMTP based MimeMessageSender which replaces the recipients with a configurable (catch-all) email address before sending the message. The original recipients are saved in custom headers: Communote-Original-To, Communote-Original-Bcc and Communote-Original-Cc
    Since:
    3.5
    Author:
    Communote team - http://communote.github.io/

      • testSettings

        public boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings,
                            javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage testMessage)
        Description copied from interface: MimeMessageSender
        Test the new configuration for sending mime messages and send a test message. Exceptions should be caught and logged.
        Specified by:
        testSettings in interface MimeMessageSender
        Overrides:
        testSettings in class SmtpMimeMessageSender
        Parameters:
        settings - the configuration to test
        testMessage - a test message to send. Can be null. In this case the method should behave like MimeMessageSender.testSettings(Map).
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is valid for this mime message sender implementation, false otherwise.
